SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.view.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UI
GUI class implements the UI interface for graphical user interface interactions in CodexNaturalis game. Extends Application to initialize JavaFX application.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

      public void chooseCardToPlay(int cardId, boolean front, Position position)
      Chooses a card to play from the network client.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card to play.
      front - True if the card should be played on the front side, false if flipped.
      position - The position to play the card.

    • showOtherFields

      public void showOtherFields(String playerName)
      Switches the scene to show the current field of the specified player. If the player is the current player, shows their own field; otherwise, shows the other player's field.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player whose field to show.

    • newChatMessage

      public void newChatMessage(String content, String recipient)
      Sends a new chat message to the network client.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the chat message.
      recipient - The recipient of the chat message ("ALL" for all players or a specific player's name).
